text:
When the Administration says #chloroquine is safe and "not killing people," that's not true. All meds have side effects, we can't let fear Trump reason. Honor to write this piece with 
@drjessigold @PoojaLakshmin @jack_turban for @nytopinion #CLpsychiatry #psychiatrymatters https://t.co/DNVgbpuCq8
